text:
[Verse]
Under the night sky
Dreams taking flight
Stars shining bright
We reach for the light

[Verse 2]
Feet off the ground
Hearts racing sound
The world spins around
Lost but not found

[Chorus]
Chasing the stars
No limit too far
We know who we are
Burning like a spark

[Verse 3]
Hands in the air
No time to spare
Breathing the rare
Moments we dare

[Bridge]
Never look down
Lift off the crown
Fly through the town
Never back down

[Chorus]
Chasing the stars
No limit too far
We know who we are
Burning like a spark
title: Chasing the Stars
